script:
"Starting a new coding project feels like a puzzle. 🧩  
You've got your tools, your brain... but something's missing. ☕  
Staring at the screen, code won't compile, brain's not booting.  
Turns out, programmers run on coffee, not just code! 😂  
Hit like for your caffeine fix! ☕👍"
preview: A humorous take on programmers' coffee addiction
